name: Soccer for Dummies
description:
Crack up with Soccer for Dummies, the physics game that makes no sense and can be controlled with just one finger.

In Soccer for Dummies you will enjoy a ridiculous and insane soccer game in which the rules you thought you knew about this sport don’t apply anymore. Shoot, jump, kick… do whatever you need to score a goal.

Features:

- Crazy physics. Stagger, jump, fall down and score goals in the silliest way.

- Different soccer fields. Play in the rain, on ice, indoors or in a field with giant goals. Any place is good for a soccer game!

- All kinds of balls! Score goals with soccer balls, tennis balls, bowling balls, beach balls…

- Funny graphics. Take a look to the silly faces of the players… Just like in real life!

- Championship mode. Anyone can win the first game but it’s getting tougher. Will you be able to win the World Cup?

- Endless mode. One game after an another and another. It will be more and more difficult until you get beaten by that hateful team.

- Two players in one device mode. Challenge your best friend and show him you are much better than him.

How to play: Tap the screen to jump and shoot at the same time. The first one to score five goals wins!
